    index="my-index-000001",
    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "analyzer": {
                "my_analyzer": {
                    "tokenizer": "my_tokenizer"
                }
            },
            "tokenizer": {
                "my_tokenizer": {
                    "type": "uax_url_email",
                    "max_token_length": 5
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
